alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 19 at 8:33AM EST until January 20 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Shallow pockets of flooding less than one foot deep during the Saturday morning high tide. * WHERE...Marthas Vineyard. * WHEN...Saturday morning high tide. * IMPACTS...Roads remain passable. Low lying areas and roads near Edgartown Harbor, including the Chappy Ferry Dock, may see shallow pockets of flooding less than one foot deep. Shallow flooding may also approach Five Corners in Vineyard Haven but any flooding will not be as significant as what occurred last week. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Edgartown MLLW Categories - Minor 4.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.2 ft, Moderate 4.2 ft, Major 5.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 19/06 AM 2.8/ 3.4 2.1/ 2.6 0.2/ 0.8 2 None 19/07 PM 2.7/ 3.2 1.9/ 2.3 0.9/ 1.4 2 None 20/07 AM 3.7/ 4.2 3.0/ 3.5 1.2/ 1.7 2 Minor 20/08 PM 2.3/ 2.8 1.6/ 2.0 0.6/ 1.1 1-3 None 21/08 AM 3.2/ 3.7 2.5/ 3.0 0.7/ 1.1 1 None 21/09 PM 2.2/ 2.7 1.4/ 1.9 0.4/ 0.9 1 None Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 4.5 ft, Moderate 6.0 ft, Major 7.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.5 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 19/06 AM 2.0/ 2.5 0.0/ 0.5 0.4/ 0.9 1-2 None 19/07 PM 2.2/ 2.7 0.2/ 0.7 0.9/ 1.4 2 None 20/07 AM 2.7/ 3.2 0.8/ 1.3 1.2/ 1.7 2 None 20/08 PM 2.0/ 2.5 0.0/ 0.5 0.7/ 1.1 2 None 21/08 AM 2.3/ 2.8 0.4/ 0.9 0.8/ 1.3 2 None 21/09 PM 1.7/ 2.2 -0.3/ 0.2 0.4/ 0.9 1-2 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
